references.paper_title: Bevfusion: Multi-task multi-sensor fusion with unified bird's-eye view representation
references.reason: This paper is a foundational work in multi-sensor fusion for BEV representation, providing a strong baseline for comparison and inspiration for the current work.
This paper introduces the VQ-VAE model, which is the core generative model used to represent BEV semantics in a tokenized, discrete space.
This paper introduces the Transformer architecture, which is used in the token decoder module for PV-BEV alignment.

references.paper_title: Deformable detr: Deformable transformers for end-to-end object detection
references.reason: This paper introduces the Deformable DETR model, which is used to improve the efficiency of the token decoder module by using deformable attention.

references.paper_title: nuScenes: A multimodal dataset for autonomous driving
references.reason: This paper introduces the nuScenes dataset, which is one of the primary datasets used to evaluate the performance of the proposed model.
